attributes.action: Make Graeme Murray Walker OBE a Knight of the realm
attributes.background:
Murray has been commentating since 1948.
Known as the voice of Formula One around the world, his services to sports, radio, and TV, Murray deserves the highest civilian recognition. Lets make the man who inspired many of towards motorsport, I'd like to see him become Knight Sir M Walker

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
